channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: World Toilet Day is today! Um .. is that really the best name?

item.title: Kirby Air Riders is radically simple alternative to racing classics like Mario Kart
item.description: Simple mechanics and diverse modes turn Kirby Air Riders into a racing game to rival Mario Kart World, a fellow Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive.

item.title: Jessica Tisch Will Remain Police Commissioner Under Mamdani
item.description: Commissioner Tisch, the current head of the N.Y.P.D., said she had agreed to serve in Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani’s administration.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Sent Trade Plummeting in August
item.description: The steep tariffs President Trump issued in August led to a contraction in imports and the trade deficit, newly released data shows.

item.title: What Polls Say About Americans’ Views on Immigrants and Immigration
item.description: A review of polls of the general public shows how opinions on immigration vary widely based on the details included in poll questions.
